mapper.insert: insert into t_co_pic_compare_info_${splitName} (CMPR_ID, REQST_SRC_CODE, BIZ_TYPE_CODE, SWFTNO, PHOTO_PATH, PIC_T_PATH, PHOTO_TYPE, PIC_T_TYPE, RSP_CODE, RSP_INFO_CNTT, CMPR_RSLT, CMPR_SCORE, OTHER_SCORE, BACKTO_MSG_CNTT, CRT_USER_ID, CRT_TIME, CRT_APP_SYS_ID, MODF_USER_ID, MODF_TIME, MODF_APP_SYS_ID) values (#{cmprId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{reqstSrcCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bizTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{swftno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picTPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picTType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rspCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rspInfoCntt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cmprRslt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cmprScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backtoMsgCntt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{crtAppSysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modfUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modfTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modfAppSysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
